text: The Likely Lads is a British sitcom series that aired on BBC1 from 16 December, 1964 to 23 July, 1966. It was created and written by Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais. It ran for 20 episodes over three seasons with half of its episodes still missing. It starred James Bolam, Rodney Bewes and Sheila Fearn. It was followed by a sequel series What Happened to the Likely Lads? and the 1976 movie The Likely Lads. ==Other websites== * *The Likely Lads Radio Series, 1967-68 * Category:1964 British television series debuts Category:1966 television series endings Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British comedy television series Category:English-language television programs
title: The Likely Lads
